name: 余琬琴
objective: 本課程介紹物理學的基本觀念,並訓練學生運用這些基本觀念來解決科學問題, 內容包括線動量,轉動,力矩,角動量,靜力平衡,簡諧運動,及波等主題
schedule:
1. Introduction
2. Center of mass and linear momentum (part 1)
3. Center of mass and linear momemtum (part 2)
4. Rotation (part 1)
5. Rotation (part 2)
6. Exam 1
7. Rolling, torque and angular momentum
8. Equilibrium and elasticity (part 1)
9. Equilibrium and elasticity  (part 2)
10. Fuilds (part 1)
11. Fluids (part 2)
12. Exam 2
13. Oscillations (part 1)
14. Oscillations (part 2)
15. Waves (part 1)
16. Waves (part 2)
17. Electric charge
18. Exam 3
materials:
”Fundamentals of Physics” by Halliday, Rensnick and Walker
8th Edition, Wiley (歐亞書局)
